values: 浪漫的；浪漫主义的；适于恋爱的；多情的；感性的；情爱的；表达爱情的；富有情调的；富于浪漫色彩的；理想化的；不切实际的；幻想的；传奇式的；夸张的；美妙的；（Romantic）浪漫主义的
浪漫主义者；浪漫的人；理想主义者；空想家；浪漫主义作家（或音乐家、艺术家）；幻想者

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 传奇；浪漫史；风流韵事；冒险故事
浪漫主义者；浪漫主义艺术家
（英）有浪漫主义思想；（英）以浪漫方式进行（等于romanticize）

word_group.brief_definition: 浪漫的爱情；浪漫恋爱；浪漫之爱
恋爱的情怀；浪漫情怀；浪漫的感受
浪漫主义小说；言情小说；爱情小说
浪漫形象；浪漫意象；浪漫影像

bilingual.source: They make love on a romantic night.
bilingual.target: 他们在浪漫的夜晚做爱。
在浪漫的晚餐后，他们接吻了。
在浪漫的晚餐后，他们亲嘴了。

bilingual.source: He prepared a romantic dinner for her.
bilingual.target: 他为她准备了一顿浪漫的晚餐。

bilingual.source: The movie tells a romantic love affair.
bilingual.target: 这部电影讲述了一段浪漫的风花雪月。

bilingual.source: We had a romantic night tour on the river.
bilingual.target: 我们在河上进行了一个浪漫的夜游。

bilingual.source: They spent a romantic honeymoon in Hawaii.
bilingual.target: 他们在夏威夷度过了一个浪漫的蜜月。

bilingual.source: We enjoyed a romantic dinner by candlelight.
bilingual.target: 我们在烛光下享受了一顿浪漫的晚餐。

bilingual.source: They spent a romantic vacation on the cruise.
bilingual.target: 他们在游轮上度过了一个浪漫的假期。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the most romantic thing I've ever heard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我听过最浪漫的话。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, this is the most romantic disease I've ever had.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我得过的最浪漫的病。

yingyinNormal.en: The guide book says it's fancy and very romantic. Right. Fancy…
yingyinNormal.zh: 导游册子上说这是家豪华浪漫的餐厅。不错，豪华的……

yingyinNormal.en: We'll see. Let's start with a little romantic dinner music, shall we?
yingyinNormal.zh: 试了才知道，我们先听一首浪漫的晚餐音乐，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it was nice. Took him to a romantic restaurant, ordered champagne, nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错呀，带他去了一家浪漫的餐厅，点了香槟，很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hey. Why don't you book a date for both of you at one of those romantic spas?
yingyinNormal.zh: 何不去给你们一起订个浪漫的SPA？

yingyinNormal.en: You know we were away, In a foreign, romantic country. I blame London. Bad London.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道，我们人在国外，又是浪漫的异乡。都怪伦敦不好。坏伦敦。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, it's just such a romantic place. I just wish I could share it with a guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个很浪漫的地方，我只希望可以跟一个男人共度。

yingyinNormal.en: Boy, Bernadette is gonna love this. Yeah. It must be nice to have someone do something so romantic.
yingyinNormal.zh: Bernadette一定会喜欢的。有人为她做这么浪漫的事，真是好。

yingyinNormal.en: We like to think of romantic feelings as spontaneous and indescribable things that come from the heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们总认为浪漫的感觉是发自内心而又无法形容的感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: Just me, her, and her annoying little dog Pepper. Well, that night, I cooked this really romantic dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有我们两个人，和她讨厌的小狗辣椒，那天晚上，我做了一顿浪漫的烛光晚餐…

yingyinNormal.en: I'd take you out for a romantic night. Some champagne, fancy dinner, feel you up on the carriage ride home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会带你出去过一个浪漫的夜晚。有香槟，法国大餐，在回家的路上抚摸你。

yingyinNormal.en: I know, and I feel terrible, but listen, finish your drink, come on home. Maybe we'll have a romantic Easter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，我觉得很糟糕，但是听着，喝完酒回家去，也许我们可以过个浪漫的复活节。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's the goal and dream, I think, of the romantic artists and the musicians. I think it's always been there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为，这就是浪漫的艺术家和音乐家的目标和梦想，我认为一直有这样一个梦想。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I was thinking maybe a romantic dinner with candles and wine. And then maybe going back to my place for dessert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在想，或许来顿浪漫的晚餐，烛光加上美酒，或许回我那边去吃点心？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no, I will. I just want to butter her up, first. You know, I'm going to take her to an amazing Valentine's dinner. Do all this romantic stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我得先哄哄她，我要带她去吃晚餐，做一些浪漫的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. No, he's not like a kook, no. He's just like this very passionate, incredibly romantic guy, that got like a teensy bit carried away, you know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，他不是疯子，他只是个非常热情，极度浪漫的家伙，只是有点过火了。

yingyinNormal.en: You feel love. Yeah, I guess, yeah, I feel a general unselfish love for just about everybody. No! Romantic, sexual love. No, no, I don't. For her! No! That is not… Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你心中有爱。对啊，我有一种对所有人的无私大爱。不是的！是浪漫的，性爱，啥，不不。我不是这样的。是对她的爱。不是的。不是这样...好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: What is wrong with you? I'm a romantic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你什么毛病啊？我是个浪漫主义者。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's really romantic, Blair. Really.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布莱尔，这真的很浪漫，真的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 浪漫主义; 浪漫精神
adj. 浪漫的；富于浪漫色彩的；传奇性的；不切实际的；耽于幻想的；虚构的；夸张的；浪漫主义的；浪漫派的；罗曼蒂克的

word_family.mean: n. 浪漫；浪漫史；风流韵事；恋爱；爱情；恋情；恋爱关系；神秘感受；浪漫气氛；传奇气氛；传奇性；浪漫精神；中世纪传奇故事；骑士故事；浪漫曲；（Romance）罗曼语

sense_info_list.en: conducive to or characterized by the expression of love; (of a person) readily demonstrating feelings of love

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, we are grieving various kinds of loss: a friendship, a <highlight>romantic</highlight> relationship or a house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，我们要为各种失去伤心：失去一段友谊，失去一段浪漫的关系，或是失去一套房子。

examination_example.sentence: While it probably wasn't apparent at the time, much of this work is permeated by a spirit of <highlight>romantic</highlight> escapism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时或许并不明显，但这些作品大多弥漫着浪漫的逃避主义精神。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Romantics</highlight> commemorated the leading painters and authors of their day, stressing the uniqueness of the artist's personal experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浪漫主义者们纪念他们那个年代的杰出画家和作家们，强调艺术家个人经历的独特性。

word_usage.usage:
romantic作形容词时，可表示“富于幻想而不切实际的”，如：
When I was younger, I had romantic ideas of becoming a writer.
我年轻一些的时候幻想过要成为一名作家。

examination_example.sentence: Dating back to 1880, the most common living arrangement among young adults has been living with a <highlight>romantic</highlight> partner, whether a spouse or a significant other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间回溯到1880年，年轻人最常见的生活安排是与爱侣生活在一起，无论是配偶还是重要的另一半。

examination_example.sentence: For young adults without a bachelor's degree, as of 2008 living at home with their parents was more prevalent than living with a <highlight>romantic</highlight> partner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于没有学士学位的年轻人来说，截至2008年，与父母同住比与恋人同住更为普遍。

examination_example.sentence: What has changed, instead, is the relative share adopting different ways of living in early adulthood, with the decline of <highlight>romantic</highlight> coupling pushing living at home to the top of a much less uniform list of living arrangements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，发生改变的是年轻人不同居住安排的相对占比：浪漫关系的减少将“住在父母家”这种方式推到了一系列愈发多元化的居住安排的首位。

examination_example.sentence: Young women, however, are still more likely to be living with a spouse of <highlight>romantic</highlight> partner (35%) than they are to be living with their parent (s)  (29%) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但比起和父母或父母一方住在一起(29%)，年轻女性更愿意和配偶或恋人住在一起(35%)。

examination_example.sentence: Many of them are going dark, replaced by more practical, but less <highlight>romantic</highlight>, LEDs (发光二极管) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多霓虹灯正在消失，取而代之的是更实用却缺少些浪漫元素的LED灯。

examination_example.sentence: The experience was not as <highlight>romantic</highlight> as you imagine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段经历并不像你想象的那么浪漫。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined word “<highlight>romantic</highlight>” in Paragraph 4 mean in Chinese?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第四段中带下划线的单词“romantic”在中文里是什么意思?

examination_example.sentence: It's not as <highlight>romantic</highlight> as kissing, but it's safe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它虽然没有接吻浪漫，但是很安全。

examination_example.sentence: He is considered to be one of the best <highlight>romantic</highlight> poets in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他被认为是中国最优秀的浪漫主义诗人之一。
